title: Ground News - New Pennsylvania law helps cancel racist language from deeds
text:
Summary by Ground News State Representative Justin Fleming (D-Dauphin) said a friend found this cringe-worthy language in his house's paperwork. Fleming's bill, now law, will create a form allowing current homeowners to officially reject the sign of the past if they choose. Fleming says his bill is more about learning from history than erasing. Share menu More
